sub_title: GM Subsurface Data and Integration & (O)SDU Business Opportunity Manager at Shell
summary:
I am a broadly experienced Petroleum Engineering Leader with specific strengths in motivating teams across a wide range of Development roles spanning core technical – project delivery – business opportunity management and digital development. My work experience covers Europe, Africa, the Middle East, Australia, Asia and the Americas with accountabilities ranging from core technical to integrated leadership.

Specialties: Field development planning, digital development, integrated uncertainty assessment and management, reservoir management and project delivery.
